4ebe54236b7548f7c9b397b97f8012ec991e7cf2.commit.message:
Removed catch Exception block.  This was masking several
NPEs that were being relied upon to indicate invalid urls.  By
removing exception handling from the normal program flow I
improved test performance by 33%.

e4af0c5ef6a7864807a4e3670ca5ba8380a8df03.commit.message:
Changed individual option booleans to use a Flags instance.
This simplified setting options and uncovered a bug in UrlTest
that demonstrates why setting options in this new manner
is less error prone.
